title: Looking for a Jungler, Mid-Laner & Supporter for competitive play (official Riot turnaments)
body:
We are currently assembling a team for competing at the _"King of Spandau"_ - an official Riot games turnament and more. (°0°)
At the moment our team consists of a diamond adc and a gold level top laner (suitable for playing vs. plat to diamond level teams, so don't worry). 

If you are an active _**Jungler**_, _**Mid-Laner**_ or  _**Supporter **_ and are english-speaking from the EUW server, contact one of us by sending a friend request to:

**NIGET Vayne**      or       **XPlor3r**

Please consider, that we want to train a lot, so please be available 2-3 times a week (preferably on weekends).
We are really looking forward to play as a team and have some fun together  :)
